title: Kenosha This Time, GOP Platform? LOL 8.25.20
itunes:title: Kenosha This Time, GOP Platform? LOL 8.25.20
description:
In episode 701, Jack and Miles are joined by district commissioner, rapper and Waiting On Reparations co-host Mariah Parker aka Linqua Franqa to discuss the shooting of Jacob Blake in Kenosha, Wisconsin, the RNC kicking off with no platform, Trump's 2nd term agenda, Kellyanne Conway stepping down, Kim Jong Un being in a coma, the coronavirus cases linked to the Sturgis motorcycle rally, how Halloween may work this year, the box office, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Police in Wisconsin shoot Black man in back multiple times, sparking protests
  2. The GOP Has No Party Platform. Literally.
  3. TRUMP CAMPAIGN ANNOUNCES PRESIDENT TRUMP’S 2ND TERM AGENDA: FIGHTING FOR YOU!
  4. Kellyanne Conway announces she's leaving the White House and George Conway is stepping away from Lincoln Project
  5. Kim Jong Un in a coma, ex-South Korean official says
  6. Nebraska links seven coronavirus cases to Sturgis, SD, motorcycle rally
  7. Motley Crue Tribute Band Rocker Blames ‘Karma’ for COVID Case at Sturgis Saloon
  8. Thanks to Coronavirus, Americans Looking at a Stay-at-Home Fall Season, Survey Suggests
  9. PARTY CITY: 96% of Parents Plan to Celebrate Halloween
  10. Terrifying Drive-In Haunted House Gives a Peek at What Halloween in Quarantine May Look Like
  11. Mars Wrigley Launching Digital Platform Treat Town To Drive Halloween Candy Sales
  12. Worried that kids won't trick-or-treat this October, Hershey's is sending Halloween candy to stores a full month earlier than expected
  13. Box Office: A Huge Opening For ‘The Eight Hundred’ Is Great News For ‘Tenet’
  14. WATCH: Metro Area - Strut

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
